subject: Perjury
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Bringing the indictment in line with a judge’s rulings, prosecutors have cut the number of charges against the former slugger to 5 from 11.
snippet: Bringing the indictment in line with a judge’s rulings, prosecutors have cut the number of charges against the former slugger to 5 from 11.
